videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns avoids the charge attempt from Jalen Brunson and gets the layup to fall plus a foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Karl-Anthony Towns gets the and-1 to fall) 2021/12/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: KAT Eurosteps through for and-1 layup

videos.description: 6-foot-8 Jake Layman struggles with 7-foot-3 Boban Marjanovic in the paint and is forced to wrap his arms around him.

videos.headline: Jake Layman has his hands full with Boban ... literally
